titleInfo.title: Letter, G. V. Carter in Knoxville, Tenn., to Customs House Officers, Cincinnati, Ohio, 1863 October 7

mods.abstract: In this letter dated 7 of October, 1863, G. V. Carter writes to the Customs House Officers, Cincinatti, Ohio that O.P. Temple be permitted to ship family supplies and merchandise to Knoxville, Tenn. Burnside signature approved.

subject.topic: Personal belongings -- Transportation -- Government policy -- Ohio -- Cincinnati -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865.
